title: BSOD
body:
Unmountable Boot Volume.
That is the message I see just before my computer starts up. Does anyone know how to fix it?
I have an IBM ThinkPad laptop and Windows Vista 32-bit, if that helps. I am not able to get past the loading screen (even for safe mode), there is no recovery option on the boot page, and the instructions online are really confusing.
I'm not the most tech savvy so if you do know how to fix it, dumb it down a bit just for me please.
Thanks in advance.

replies.body:
Since this is an issue with your PC specifically and not League, I recommend consulting a PC repair shop or a tech-savvy friend. If you haven't had luck with online guides, it may not be a good idea to do risky stuff you aren't comfortable with.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
